name: Community water system deliveries
description: Water delivered to community water systems for residential, commercial, and industrial use

name: Agricultural revenue
description: Impact on agricultural production and revenue

name: Environmental flows
description: Water allocated to support ecosystem health, wildlife habitats, and environmental protection

name: Delta ecology
description: Ecological responses to flow, measured by direct indicators (SAV growth, salinity, turbidity, microhabitat availability)

name: Freshwater for in-Delta uses
description: How often water in the western Delta is fresh enough for in-Delta uses

name: Freshwater for Delta exports
description: Frequency with which water at Delta pumps (Banks and Jones) meets salinity thresholds for drinking water

name: Reservoir storage
description: Amount of water stored in California's major reservoir systems each spring

name: Groundwater storage
description: Amount of water stored in underground aquifer systems

name: Salmon abundance
description: Population levels of Winter-run Chinook salmon in the Sacramento River
